entry.title: At least being convinced you were a cryptid comes in handy
entry.summary:
Author: Batmansaliensocks

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,306Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Clark was convinced he was a cryptid when he was younger and once he finds out batman actually is one, he attempts to recruit him to the JL. somehow this will end in passionate kissing (trust)
